name: Lateral Thinking
description: Creative problem-solving through indirect and non-linear approaches

steps.name: Challenge - Question fundamental assumptions
steps.description:
Systematically challenge existing assumptions and conventional approaches

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Systematically question the fundamental assumptions behind this problem. Ask 'Why?' about every aspect of the current approach. What if the opposite were true? What assumptions are we taking for granted that might be wrong?

steps.name: Random Entry - Connect unexpected stimuli
steps.description:
Use random words or concepts to spark new connections and perspectives

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Generate a random word or concept completely unrelated to this problem. Now force connections between this random element and your challenge. How could [random element] inspire a solution? What properties, functions, or characteristics could transfer?

steps.name: Provocation - Use deliberate incorrectness to spark ideas
steps.description:
Create deliberately wrong or impossible statements to escape conventional thinking

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Create deliberately provocative and seemingly wrong statements about this problem. What if we did the exact opposite of the conventional approach? What if we had infinite resources? What if we had zero resources? Use these provocations to spark new thinking directions.

steps.name: Fractionation - Break down conventional views
steps.description:
Decompose the problem and examine each component from multiple unconventional angles

ðŸ§  ENHANCED THINKING REQUIRED: Use the SequentialThinking tool to work through this systematically.

Break this problem into its smallest components. For each component, examine it from completely different perspectives - physical, emotional, temporal, functional, metaphorical. What happens if you recombine these components in unexpected ways?

steps.name: Concept Formation - Synthesize breakthrough insights
steps.description: Integrate lateral thinking insights into actionable creative solutions
